name: node-poweredup
description: A Javascript module to interface with LEGO Powered Up components.

scripts.docs: jsdoc -d docs -c jsdoc.conf.json -t ./node_modules/ink-docstrap/template -R README.md dist/node/consts.js dist/node/poweredup-node.js dist/node/lpf2hub.js dist/node/wedo2smarthub.js dist/node/boostmovehub.js dist/node/puphub.js dist/node/pupremote.js dist/node/duplotrainbase.js dist/node/controlplushub.js dist/node/hub.js dist/node/consts.js
scripts.all: npm run build:all && npm run docs

author: Nathan Kellenicki <nathan@kellenicki.com>
